page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Fathers Jobs_We surveyed 133 children in 1985.There were sixteen people in the building industry.that's the most popular.Engineering is the second most popular with 13 people.Office workers came next with 11 workers.10 people were in management.The 5th most popular was salesmen with 8 men.Orders continue as follows:H.G.V.drivers_6;factory workers;Researchers and Lecturers_5; Caretaking and Cleaning_4;Computer Workers,Aeroplane Industry and Furniture Manufacturing,Government Officers Accountants and Garage Workers_3;Electronics Workers, Decorators,Scrap Dealers,Chemists,Scientists and Nurses_2;Printing,Postman,Surveyors, Planning,Police,Barmaid,Landlord(Pub), Taxi Drivers,Insurance,Lensemaker,
